translation.variant: Permit Edit Of Read Only Equipment Properties

translation.note: the title for a dialog where the user edits the permissions for the current file.
Name for a checkbox that enables permissions.
a menu that allows the user the to edit the permissions for the current file.
the name of a tab on a dialog. This tab allows the user to edit the default permissions that are used for new files.
the title for a dialog where the user edits permissions for the current file.
Engineer users are allowed to pick more than one vendor, however, at least one vendor must be selected.
translation.variant: At least one vendor must be selected.

translation.note: status bar text that shows the current file (control program or view) has some form of restricted permissions. We don't specify what.
a tooltip for the permissions field on the status bar. It explains what this field is showing and that you can click on it to view and edit the permissions.
translation.variant: Shows whether or not the current file has any permissions restrictions. Click to view/edit.
You are not the owner of this file and can not edit the permissions.
